Headline: Loop-bound Pink and 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Morgan
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink and 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Morgan due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink and 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Morgan due to a mechanical problem. 

Shuttle buses have been requested from to provide connecting service in both directions for:

Green Line Riders -Damen/Lake to Clark/Lake

Pink Line Riders - Polk to Clark/Lake

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
